revised_title: The Scottish Marine Biological Association: A Historical Overview
tldr: This article provides a historical overview of the Scottish Marine Biological Association, its founding, and the development of its marine station at Millport. The association's work focused on the investigation of marine fauna and flora in the Clyde sea area and fostering biological research. The article highlights the challenges faced by the association and its impact on Scottish marine biology.
